level.heading: Formalities.
level.text: A premarital agreement must be in writing and signed by both parties. It is enforceable without consideration.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-82, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 46-501.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 2 of the Uniform Premarital Agreement Act. See 9C Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
